Title: Database Partitioning Management
Description: This project builds a flexible tool for DBAs to manage and control partition in SQL Server.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project builds a flexible tool for DBAs to manage and control partition in SQL Server.


This application helps DBA to manage and control his SQL Server Database's Partitioning. Please give me any comment to nghinh@gmail.com.

Features of this application includes:
- Define Partition Function
- Define Partition Schema
- Generate Partition Table SQL Script
- Generate moving data files
- Generate backup/restore script
- Show partition information
- Show partition schemas/function
